byline.original: By STUART ELLIOTT and TANZINA VEGA

abstract: Stuart Elliott and Tanzina Vega Advertising column presents highlights, lowlights and sidelights of Advertising Week 2011, held in New York Oct 3-7.
snippet: Advertising Week 2011 wrapped up last Friday, after an event full of celebrities, a roast, and commemorations of brand characters and slogans.
lead_paragraph: Advertising Week 2011 wrapped up last Friday, after an event full of celebrities, a roast, and commemorations of brand characters and slogans.

headline.main: Food Trucks, Celebrities and a Madison Avenue Walk of Fame
headline.print_headline: Food Trucks, Celebrities and a Madison Avenue Walk of Fame
headline.seo: At Advertising Week, Food Trucks, Celebrities and a Walk of Fame
